nodes.text: We should seriously consider reducing prison overcrowding and abuses by replacing at least some prison sentences with corporal punsihment
some people would be more cowed by taking thirty lashes than sitting in a prison for ten years
that would certainly be cheaper than incarceration

If corporal punishment is cheaper than incarceration and in some cases more effective than incarceration then we should seriously consider reducing prison overcrowding and abuses by replacing at least some prison sentences with corporal punsihment.
